metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47372 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the Create event section in Pandora FMS Console v766 and lower. An attacker typically exploits this vulnerability by injecting XSS payloads on popular pages of a site or passing a link to a victim, tricking them into viewing the page that contains the stored XSS payload.

criterions.comment: pandora: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
